name: Pillow_Perfect_Finders_Keepers_Blue_Throw_Pillow
reviews: I am always a little concerned when I order something like this on-line. Especially the colors. I was more than pleased and pleasantly surprised by how well these pillows are exactly what I had in mind to go in my living room. Price was reasonable for the quality of the fabric and construction.
These pillows are cute but a little small for my couch!
Just what we needed for an accent pillow in the living room. Very good detailed pattern, nice quality.

This pillow is exactly as show online. The deep blue is a blue teal and not an aqua teal. The variance of blue colors blend in nicely with my living room rug. Pillow is nice and full and constructed well.
These are so nice and made in the USA, recommended.

I love the colors in this pillow. We bought 2, and each one had a slightly different pattern. The web site was true to the colors, and they matched our sofa perfectly. The designs are beautiful. Price is high, but I splurged and am glad I did. These will last many years.
This is gorgeous and I am waiting for the rest that I ordered for my couch but very happy with them. colors are beautiful, soft, and inviting.
I got these in the lumbar size. Just what I have been looking for, love them and the muted colors go perfect in my entrance room!
I love this pillow so much I ordered another one!
Beautiful pillows< top quality fabric
Just love the colors. Goes with my new couch and chair beautifully.
Love it. Just what I expected
Pillow is exactly as shown -colors and size accurate--pillow is firm and sewn well
Colors are like pictured and this pillow is perfect!
I am re-doing my kitchen and family room. My color story tan,sand and variations of teal . this is the perfect match!
It's beautiful, well constructed, sturdy yet soft and the colors are exactly as they appear on screen. My Mom said I need another one ASAP!
I really like these. Very plump
Love the colors and pattern of these pillows. Very true to color, also
What a beautiful pillow!!! I bought them for my sofa and loveseat and they brighten up the room.
Lovely pillow of good quality.
nice pillow I like it, don't love it.

I love the look of these pillow -- the colors and pattern are exactly what I was looking for. The quality, however, leaves a bit to be desired. After only a week of use, they have already lost their shape! They've gotten pancaked and misshapen from leaning on them. I have tried to pull them back into shape, but to no avail. If you are using these for aesthetics only, you'll be pleased. But if you are looking for function, I wouldn't recommend these.
The pillows are filled with cheap filler. Very disappointed in quality. The fabric was lovely but definately not worth $$$
description:
Complete your room's look with this traditional and
visuallyappealing cotton throw pillow by Pillow Perfect. Rich blue,
taupeand chocolate floral accents perfectly complement a neutral
beigebase to enhance your decor. This floral throw pillow's 100
percentcotton cover feels soft and natural but also has a tough
anddurable weave to make it a long-term addition to your
collection. Set includes: One Throw PillowEdging: KnifeDimensions: 18-inch, or 18.5-inches x 11.5-inches, or
  16.5-inch, or 24.5-inchClosure: SewnCover material: 100-percent cottonFill material: 100-percent polyester fiberCare instructions: Spot Clean OnlyStyleFloralMaterialCottonPatternFloralSet IncludeOne PillowCare InstructionSpot CleanSeason or HolidayAll SeasonsPillow ShapeSquareColorBlueFill TypePolyesterPillow TypeAccent
